data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva, Helio Ricardo Da, Silva, Ricardo Alves- (2008): New coastal and insular species of the bromeligenous Scinax perpusillus group, from the State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil (Anura, Hylidae). Zootaxa 1914: 34-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184585
